name: AlpenCROSS
description: AlpenCROSSThe FIRST MOUNTAINBIKE - Nature Simulation Game for PC
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 32 (Windows XP or above) Prosessor: Intel Core 2Duo or similar Minne: 2000 MB RAM Grafikk: (not mainboard integrated) Shader Model 3.0 DirectX: Versjon 9.0c Lagring: 64 MB tilgjengelig plass Tilleggsmerknader: only 1x to install! internet connection - to install only 1 (one) time required
recommended_requirements: Anbefalt: OS: Windows 64 (Windows XP or above) Prosessor: Intel Core i5 or similar Minne: 4000 MB RAM Grafikk: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660, AMD Radeon 5700 or similar DirectX: Versjon 10 Lagring: 256 MB tilgjengelig plass Tilleggsmerknader: only 1x to install! internet connection - to install only 1 (one) time required
